low.question: Which statement about cracking knuckles is correct?
options: Cracking knuckles causes arthritis
Cracking knuckles does not cause arthritis
Cracking knuckles prevents arthritis
low.answer: Cracking knuckles does not cause arthritis

low.question: Which claim about drinking eight glasses of water daily is most accurate?
options: Everyone needs exactly eight glasses daily
Hydration needs vary by person and activity
Eight glasses prevent all health problems
low.answer: Hydration needs vary by person and activity

low.question: Which statement about sugar and hyperactivity in children reflects evidence?
options: Sugar directly causes hyperactivity in most children
Sugar rarely causes measurable hyperactivity
Sugar permanently changes brain chemistry in kids
low.answer: Sugar rarely causes measurable hyperactivity

low.question: Which idea about cold weather and catching colds is supported by research?
options: Cold weather by itself causes viral infections
Viruses spread more in close indoor settings during cold weather
Cold air kills immunity immediately
low.answer: Viruses spread more in close indoor settings during cold weather

low.question: Which belief about microwave ovens is correct?
options: Microwave ovens make food radioactive
Microwave ovens heat water molecules and do not cause radiation in food
Microwave ovens remove all nutrients from food

options: Detox diets remove industrial chemicals from fat quickly

low.question: Which statement reflects the truth about vaccines and autism?
options: Vaccines cause autism

low.answer: Extensive research shows no causal link between vaccines and autism

Healthy fats are essential and can support weight management
Fat-free foods are always healthiest

All deodorants always cause cancer

low.question: Which statement about sitting and exercise is true?

Both regular exercise and reducing sitting improve health

low.answer: Both regular exercise and reducing sitting improve health

options: Everyone benefits from a gluten-free diet
Only people with celiac disease or sensitivity need gluten-free diets

options: Organic produce contains no pesticides at all

For most people, moderate egg consumption has minimal impact on heart risk

low.question: Which claim about taking vitamin C to prevent colds is most accurate?

Vitamin C cures viral infections instantly
